question:
If \(2^k - 2^{k+1} + 2^{k-1} = 2^k\)\(m\), what is the value of \(m\)?
(A) \(-1\)
(B) \(-\frac{1}{2}\)
(C) \(\frac{1}{2}\)
(D) \(1\)
(E) \(2\)
